name: Forced Silence
description:
It's a digital piece by Mrs M.Heydari as a member of Sepas art group.

In this suffocating atmosphere, we are forced to remain silent. We must be deaf, dumb and blind and have no right to protest.
We have drowned out our own cry of anger and pain, and the shadow of oppression has cast a shadow over us.

"My Land" is one of the most famous and nostalgic Afghan music made about freedom that has been used in this piece.
 
It's for Afghan girls,wishing them Freedom.
